SEARCH
Package cn.nukkit.utils.firework

Class FireworkBuilder

java.lang.Object
cn.nukkit.utils.firework.FireworkBuilder
public class FireworkBuilder extends Object
Builder for a Firework allowing to include multiple explosions ExplosionBuilder and to provide an additional Entity as rider.

The rider is unmounted upon explosion of the firework.

Returns a EntityFireworksRocket upon build.

Since:
2025/04/08

    • build

      public EntityFireworksRocket build(Position pos, IChunk chunk)
      Builds the Firework (EntityFireworksRocket) for a given position and chunk.

      If a rider (Entity) was provided upon creation of the builder it is mounted here onto the firework.

      Parameters:
      pos -
      chunk -
      Returns:
      EntityFireworksRocket
